siteMetadata.about: A software engineer who wants to solve real-world problems using technology. Started my journey in 2014 by experimenting with Linux and Android. Over the next few years explored various domains like cyber security, backend engineering, and DevOps. Currently focusing on backend engineering and DevOps.
